Description: Fragment of decorative, woollen ribbon from tunic; Brocaded design in red on a dark blue ground; Repeating design with a border crossing diagonally, the border made of rosettes and vine-leaves; Warp: S spun Z ply blue wool, c.14tpc; Weft: S spun blue wool, c.9tpc, brocading in S spun Z ply, red wool; Edges: two simple selvedges and others ragged
Curator's comments: Previous location M3/P; Originally sewn to a garment, probably a tunic; Information from Hero Granger-Taylor (10.10.1995)
Condition: Fair; Ragged but fair where intact
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev Greville John Chester
